text: Kulharia station Kulharia is a village in Bhojpur district in the Indian state of Bihar. It is one of the big villages in bhojpur. ==Demography== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Particulars !! Total !! Male!!Female |- | Total No. of Houses||1157|| || |- | Population ||| 7206|| 3781||3420|| == Geography == Kulharia is located at 25°34'27.4"N 84°46'17.7"E. ==References== Category:Villages in Bhojpur district, India
title: Kulharia
